text: Miki Muster (born Nikolaj Muster, 22 November 1925 – 7 May 2018) was a Slovenian academic sculptor, illustrator, cartoonist, and animator. He was born in Murska Sobata, Yugoslavia. In 1952, Muster started drawing his most famous comic strip Zvitorepec, which was running in magazines Poletove podobe in povesti (PPP) and Tedenska tribuna. His works were inspired by Argentine cartoonist Guillermo Mordillo. Muster died on 7 May 2018 in a nursing home in Notranje Gorice, Slovenia of Alzheimer's disease aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kar sem si želel kot mulc, sem uresničil (interview) ("I Have Realised What a Wished for Myself as a Kid"; Dnevnik, 9 June 2007) * Miki Muster: Packanje z barvami mi ni všeč (interview) ("I Don't Like Blotching with Colours"; Dnevnik, 7 February 2015) Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Slovenian artists Category:Slovenian academics Category:Illustrators Category:Cartoonists Category:Animators
title: Miki Muster
